website_summaries.verdict: This base won't work for everyone, but makeup enthusiasts who prefer minerals, SPF, and powdered formulas will appreciate that it also does a good job concealing imperfections.
pros: A multi-purpose product in a powdered mineral formula that can double as an eyeshadow base and concealer
Helps eyeshadows stay true to color
Goes on smoothly with an eyeshadow applicator
cons: May settle in creases, especially on customers with crepey eyelids

website_summaries.verdict: A silky-soft mineral concealer by a trusted brand that is easy to apply and offers light coverage. However, the powdered formula won't work for everyone, including those with deep lines or wrinkles.
pros: Mineral concealer in a powdered formula that is easy to apply and blend with an applicator brush
Works well for concealing under-eye circles
Can be used as an eyeshadow base
cons: Tends to settle/cake in lines, crevices, and wrinkles
Doesn't provide the best coverage for some dark spots or red imperfections

customer_reviews.title: Not a fake
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to the reviewers who posted pix of the authentic product! I was able to check mine and found it's the real deal. I have used Bisque in its original color since the '90s when the company opened its locations outside of San Francisco Bay Area, CA. I haven't noticed any change in quality or ease of application even when it was sold in 2010 to Sishiedo. I love the way it hides both temporary and permanent flaws.
customer_reviews.author: SMH2

customer_reviews.title: Not a fake
customer_reviews.text: First off, I received the actual bare minerals bisque and not a fake so I was very pleased with that. It came packaged well. I already own the concealer brush from bare minerals so the concealer works as expected. I love this stuff bc I cannot feel it on my skin at all and I don’t get any crease lines, plus it has spf. I suffer from rosacea so this stuff makes it appear that my skin is normal. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh lightweight and coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love bare minerals concealer. Great coverage without the heavy weight. Glad it was available on amazon since sephora is closed during this pandemic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Change in formula??
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if BM changed the formula, but it’s nothing like it was. I’ve used it for about ten years and loved the coverage. This last container I got was lighter and doesn’t cover spots at all! It even smells differently. I haven’t contacted the company directly to confirm a change in formula, but I’m very unhappy and dissatisfied. Not sure I’ll continue using. Update: after reading other reviews, it seems I purchased a knock-off. I reported it to Amazon and have received a refund. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: RAR

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to for concealer. I've tried using other mineral concealers but none of them cover as well or as smoothly. I'm light complected so the regular bisque is perfect for me. If I need a little more concealing than usual, I'll put some of the powder in my palm and add a drop or 2 of water. Now it's a liquid concealer! The only thing I don't like is the price. I can get the Bare Minerals foundation and mineral veil for lots cheaper so I don't know why this is so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinestone Mom

customer_reviews.title: Age
customer_reviews.text: At the age of 71 still love Bare Minerals products. Easy, Fast, Looks good. Use Bisque with Mineral Veil & a little cheek color.
customer_reviews.author: C. Radanovich

customer_reviews.title: ... slight redness in my cheeks and this is the best concealer I've found
customer_reviews.text: I have slight redness in my cheeks and this is the best concealer I've found. I even tried the Bare Escentuals Correcting Concealer that's more of a cream but I always return to this one. I use a concealer brush to apply it very lightly and that's usually enough to cover any redness. If I apply too much I notice it will get a little cakey by the end of the day, but that could be fixed with the combination of some other product.
customer_reviews.author: woodchuck

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product off and on for many years and like it. It does not cake or sit in fine lines. This is the real deal, not an imposter.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn ATL

customer_reviews.title: The coverage of dark circles underneath my eyes, sun spots, and redness wasn't nearly as good as Well Rested.
customer_reviews.text: I usually use BareMinerals Well Rested for my concealer, and I ordered this stuff by accident. I figured no big deal because I had seen the QVC show about Bisque ranting and raving about it. I didn't like it at all. The coverage of dark circles underneath my eyes, sun spots, and redness wasn't nearly as good as Well Rested. I also felt like it didn't blend in with my skin well, either, as it kind of had more of a pink look.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Staszak

customer_reviews.title: Continues to love bare minerals
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product. It covers spots and rosatia. It doesn't clump and gives my skin a smooth even texture. I have been using bare minerals products for over 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: DHS-WI

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for and I will stick with Bare Escentuals
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Bare Minerals 3 years ago and I haven't looked back since. No more worries about matching liquid foundation to my skin (which NEVER happens), now I think I would forego makeup rather than wear anything other than Bare Minerals. This multi-tasking bisque is great for the eyes, it literally will take years off your face. I look as though I just returned from vacation and I get a lot of compliments on how pretty my eyes are! Packaging is great, comes with a sifter and even though the container is small, it lasts a long time. I will gladly pay the extra money for Bare Minerals brand, it works like a mini facelift.
customer_reviews.author: Tr@cie

customer_reviews.title: This is the ideal concealer to use!
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is so nice to use on under eyes, or allover the face, It's so light on the skin, you don't need to use a lot, and it stays put all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Keane

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer on Market
customer_reviews.text: BMin makes the best concealer and eyelid prep powder ever. Do not waste your money on concealer creams (even the one made by BMin). Be sure to use the concealer brush as it makes all the difference in terms of effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as product directly from BareMinerals
customer_reviews.text: This product differs from the Bare Minerals concealer I have been using for several years. Even the packaging is different. Pretty sure its aknockoff. I will stick with ordering directly from Bare minerals or another authorized retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A miracle!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had something work so good No one wears liquid make-up after the age of fifty. I saw Bare Minerals a long time ago ov QVC. I ordered it, used it ,love it and would never care to use anythng else. This is make-up that covers yet, feels as though you have nothing on your face!! Thank you Bare Minerals and Thank you for carrying Bare Minerals!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Be Without!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that I use on a daily basis. It is as it states, a multi-tasking product. I use it as an eyeshadow base, undereye darkness corrector, age spot lightener, blemish concealer, etc. Recently, when all of the local stores that typically carry this product were sold out and having difficulty replenishing stock, I turned to Amazon and of course, there it was and without the hassle of driving around from store to store and coming home empty handed. Thanks again, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mschloe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and coverage. I dot some with a small brush on spots and then use it all over as my only make up. It's very easy on sensitive skin and covers well.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using BE for years. This is bisque, the concealer, in the same color that came with the BE starter set a decade ago. Goes on easily and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Helen W.

customer_reviews.title: Covers well
customer_reviews.text: The powder covers blemishes well, but it will accent any wrinkles you've got. Still, I use it because it's probably the most effective at covering some serious blemishes and brown spots. It feels natural and very light on the skin, not cakey or greasy, because it's a powder form. Just know that if you use it to cover, say, the under-eye area, it will accentuate the lines or wrinkles there.
customer_reviews.author: D.Birk

customer_reviews.title: I love the bisque
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Bare Minerals. I love the bisque! It hides all sorts of things that I don't want seen. I don't like all of the products that Bare Minerals offers, but this is one of the best. Their powder eye shadows are wonderful as well as the foundation. I use summer bisque during the warm weather when I have a slightly darker complexion and bisque during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: JODI

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what I would do without this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of redness and skin discoloration. This concealer takes care of it all, and looks completely natural. I don't know what I would do without this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Greene

customer_reviews.title: My favorite concealer
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is amazing! I need a full coverage foundation because I have acne scars and dark spots. I add this concealor to my everyday regiment and it really smooths out my complexion and gives it a soft finish.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya kay

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer for light skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer for light skin. It covers small red veins on face and looks natural and covers small imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: gypsygirl

customer_reviews.title: Happy to get
customer_reviews.text: bareMinerals thru Amazon. Best mineral makeup. Have tried others always come back to this. Very good coverage and base for foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Smooth finished look
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the finish this gave my skin. Would buy again,but maybe a lighter shade for my tone.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews for this were absolutely fantastic. I am not sure if we are even talking about the same product. This was at best, okay. There was no visible difference between bare skin and this. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: The best undereye concealer I've found
customer_reviews.text: The best undereye concealer I've found. Just tapping a small amount in the inner-corner of my eyes, instantly makes me look like I've had 8 hours of sleep. I love that it's mineral/powder concealer and it's not goopy like liquid concealers. Doesn't settle into fine lines either! You don't have to use much, so the little pot will last a long time! I've been using it daily for 3 years, and am on my 3rd .08oz pot!
customer_reviews.author: SBiddle

customer_reviews.title: I have rosacea, and this is one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea, and this is one of the few products that I can use. I have fair skin, and this concealer is a bit dark, but I'm sticking with it, as it blends well enough, and I do not think bareMinerals has a lighter color concealer. It covers my rosacea well, which is a relief. I use this with bareMinerals mineral foundation.
customer_reviews.author: micah68

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage!
customer_reviews.text: This powder works well as a cover up and doesn’t cause break outs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: The product had a large sticker covering the bottom that stated it was multi taskers bisque, but it was mineral veil powder. I didn’t need mineral veil but will use it eventually, so kept it. Couldn’t send back/reorder, because I needed it before a reorder could arrive.
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: Staple for me for life please don't stop making it or change it
customer_reviews.text: This amazing product can be used selectively where you need and stays in place.I gave up foundation and powder to set it (I couldn't keep it on without translucent powder) years ago . Women my age still using makeup techniques they used in their 20s / 30s just look older and dated. I highly recommend it anyone over the age of 50 or anyone at any age. thanks bare minerals!
customer_reviews.author: milliesgirl

customer_reviews.title: For me this is a great cover, I have light skin and only want ...
customer_reviews.text: For me this is a great cover, I have light skin and only want a bit of cover on my cheeks does not cake blends well with my skin color. Very happy with and will purchase again. Very easy to apply. Stephanie Tabor
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Coverage even without Foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Applies easily with B.M. concealer brush, and covers extremely well. I use it to cover acne scars, as well as active break-outs. It is flawless under my foundation. Works well when worn alone though too, a real plus! I won't go out without it!
customer_reviews.author: SpikeysMommyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is really my favorite bare minerals product. This is one necessity of my make-up routine if I'm feeling too rushed to do the rest. With a little cover-up on dark circles and acne scars & then this on top, my face looks so clear and almost gleams! It makes me feel younger & healthier looking which is a plus for any product you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: My Beauty Must-Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used bisque as my foundation actually for over 18 years and it is amazing! If you use it over a nice moisturizer with SPF, it gives you a nice flawless glow; I swear by it! I will never change brands!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Eckman Art & Design

customer_reviews.title: It absolutely works
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I’ve used for years. It’s fantastic. Covers up dark spots and under eye darkness COMPLETELY. It feels sheer but there’s complete coverage. It’s really amazing. You will not be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wear it
customer_reviews.text: My skin is fairly light, not vampire white, but this showed up as dark and orange-y on my skin. I bought it trusting some of the comments that there is no tint to this.
customer_reviews.author: Ida May

customer_reviews.title: ... have used bareMinerals for a long time and am pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have used bareMinerals for a long time and am pleased with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried just about every concealer made, but this one works better than any. No clumping, creasing, or fading away. You can use it for spots or all over, depending on your needs. It covers completely and lasts all day.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love my Bare Minerals products and have been using them for years!

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This concealer hides every imperfection with a very light weight feeling. It is fast and easy to apply. It also lasts all day, even in heat!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concealer
customer_reviews.text: This type of concealing makeup is just right for my skin tone and type. I am so glad to have found Bare Minerals. I find this concealer to do a better job of cover-up for blemishes than anything I have found in department and drug stores.
customer_reviews.author: expialidocious

customer_reviews.title: this stuff isnt bad but its definitely not near as high quality as ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the real stuff based on my experience using the original authentic bare minerals concealers, this stuff isnt bad but its definitely not near as high quality as the real product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great coverage anywhere and it lasts a long time. I use it daily and it covers all the veins, imperfections, etc. that come with older age. Non drying too which is a plus.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job covering up

customer_reviews.title: Natural and effective in concealing blemishes.

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer for skin redness
customer_reviews.text: Bare minerals is the only concealer that works for redness of the skin. It is light and wonderful too. Very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful product, a fabulous staple in my makeup routine, was delivered quickly! As with everything, you have to know how to use it and prep the skin in advance but the results are well worth the effort! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: feels like you're wearing nothing at all but covers beautifully

customer_reviews.text: Love it, I don't use anything else to cover my imperfections. I've gotten all my friends hooked on it. Works on all my friends skin tones from my tan caucasian friends to my asian friends. It's magic! :)

product_meta.title: bareMinerals - Multi-Tasking Concealer Broad Spectrum SPF 20 Bisque , 0.07 ounce
product_meta.description: An utterly weightless loose powder concealer that protects your skin with SPF while effortlessly concealing imperfections, redness and blemishes. Our award-winning mineral powder concealer gives you natural-looking coverage in a flash. With the added protection of broad spectrum SPF 20, this lightweight concealer covers acne, redness and other skin imperfections yet feels like nothing at all.
feature_bullets: bareMinerals Multi-Tasking Loose Powder Concealer is an utterly weightless loose powder concealer that protects your skin with SPF while effortlessly concealing imperfections, redness and blemishes
Natural-looking coverage in a flash. With the added protection of broad spectrum SPF 20, this lightweight concealer covers acne, redness and other skin imperfections yet feels like nothing at all
Dermatologist tested. Recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as effective broad spectrum sunscreen
Clean Without Compromise: Cruelty-free and FREE OF parabens, phthalates, formaldehyde, chemical sunscreen, triclosan, triclocarban, propylene glycol, mineral oil, coal tar, and microbeads
2 g / 0.07 oz. "Summer Bisque" is intended for medium complexions
